brandChangeText: {order, selectordinal, one {Web Development} two {IT Outsourcing} =3 {Beyond The Web}}
test: I am the {order, selectordinal, one {Frontend Development} two {#nd person} =3 {#rd person}  other {#th person}}
aboutText:
Spider is the leading web development company based in Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam.

Spider was founded in 2015, focuses on web development and IT outsourcing services for small businesses, startups and agencies in the USA, Europe, Australia, Singapore and Vietnam.

We specialize in building high-quality websites and applications using thelatest web technologies including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP and Node.js.

We follow W3C standards using the latest web coding standards and best practices including W3C compliance, semantic web, web accessibility, search engine optimization and mobile-friendly using responsive web design.

We believe in offering the most efficient, reliable and affordable web development solutions to our clients.

We guarantee to deliver clean and high-quality code, maintainable and extensible for future development.

We will help you to grow your business and achieve your goals.

We always strive to meet your demands beyond expectation.
serviceHeader: {order, selectordinal, one {Frontend Development} =2 {Backend Development} =3 {Application Development} =4 {JavaScript Full Stack Development} =5{Dedicated Team} =6{Maintenance & Support}}
serviceText:
{order, selectordinal, one {

Bootstrap is the most popular HTML, CSS, and JavaScrip framework for developing responsive, mobile first projects on the web.

React is a declarative, efficient, and flexible JavaScript library for building user interfaces.

We use Bootstrap for building frontend templates and React for building web applications.

} =2{

Node.js is an open source, cross-platform runtime environment for developing server-side and networking applications.

PHP is a popular general-purpose scripting language that is especially suited to web development.

We use Node.js and Laravel to build web applications and RESTful web services.

We build eCommerce websites using WordPress and WooCommerce.

} =3{

React Native is an open-source mobile application framework to develop applications for Android, iOS and Web.

Electron uses Chromium and Node.js to build cross-platform applications using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript technologies.

We use Electron to build desktop applications and React Native to build mobile applications.

} =4{

JavaScript is one of the most popular programming languages in the world.

JavaScript is everywhere: web, mobile, desktop and server.

We use React to build web applications and Node.js to build RESTful web services.

} =5{

We provide dedicated team services to ramp up your development team quickly and efficiently to meet your project deadlines or business needs.

} =6{

We provide maintenance and support services to keep your website up to date, running smoothly, adding new features, fixing bugs and technical issues.

}}
clientText:
We work closely with our clients and partners to deliver the best results possible.

We believe in long-term partnerships with our clients that bring values to both businesses.

Here are a few of the many clients that we serve:
careerText:
At Spider, we respect and care for each other.

Please send your CV to our recruitment team at contact@spider.vn
careerHeader: {order, selectordinal, one {Frontend Internship} two {Frontend Developer} =3 {Backend Developer}}
careerDesc:
{order, selectordinal, one {

We are looking for someone who is motivated, innovative, enthusiastic, hard-working, interested in web technologies and willing to learn.

Duration of the internship: 2 to 4 months

Must have:

  • Knowledge of HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Bootstrap
  • Major in IT, Computer Science or relevant experience
  • Desire to learn and research
  • Ability to communicate in English

Nice to have:

  • Knowledge of jQuery, React, Node.js
  • Knowledge of ES, Babel, Webpack, Yarn, NPM
  • Passion for Frontend development

Benefits:

  • Monthly internship allowance.
  • After the completion of training, trainee will become official employee.
} =2 {

Job Description

  • Practical experience in web development using HTML, CSS and JavaScript

  • Knowledge of JavaScript scope, closure, browser events and cross-browser issues

  • Experience of building websites using best practice techniques such as mobile first, responsive web design and progressive enhancement

  • Experience in developing robust and efficient code for large scale production applications

  • Experience in working with Bootstrap, jQuery and JS frameworks such as Angular, React, React Native

  • Experience in working with Node.js

  • Have knowledge about RESTful API and GraphQL

  • Ability to work on a team, set priorities, work under pressure,adapt to demanding situations, and maintain schedules

  • Proficient understanding of code versioning tools, such as Git

} =3 {

Job Description

  • Proven software development experience in PHP.

  • Solid knowledge of object-oriented programming

  • Integration of static templates developed by Frontend developers

  • Build efficient, testable, and reusable PHP modules

  • Follow industry best practices

  • Troubleshoot to solve architectural challenges and performance problems

  • Practical experience in development of WordPress, Laravel

  • Experience in working experience with Node.js, Hapi

  • Experience in working with MongoDB, MySQL

  • Have knowledge about RESTful API, GraphQL

  • Experience in using Composer for dependency management

  • Experience in developing robust and efficient code for large scale production applications

  • Ability to work on a team, set priorities, work under pressure, adapt to demanding situations, and maintain schedules

  • Ability to work on a team, set priorities, work under pressure, adapt to demanding situations, and maintain schedules.

  • Familiar with CI/CD build and deployment processes

}}
contactText:
Please do not hesitate to contact us at any time if you have anyfurther questions or concerns and we are always ready to assist you.

We would love to work with you on your next projects.

Contact us today to discuss your next projects by filling out the enquiry form below or just drop us a line at contact@spider.vn.
